pkgmetadata.longdescription: Income Polarization Index // The DER (or PaF) income polarization index as proposed by Duclos J. Y., Esteban, J. and Ray D. (2004). "Polarization: concepts, measurement, estimation". Econometrica, 72(6): 1737--1772. doi:10.1111/j.1468-0262.2004.00552.x. The index may be computed for a single or for a range of values of the alpha-parameter. Bootstrapping is also available.
